site_title: YouTube Play Button and Happy Face by Jeremy Shafer

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: 1000 Subscribers Celebration!!! What happens when you add a YouTube Play Button with a Happy Face? You get the Origami YouTube Play Button / Happy Face designed by Jeremy Shafer. This model is perfect for this occasion! I had the YouTube Play Button from Jo Nakashima at 200 Subscribers, and the Smiley Face Emoji from Jo Nakashima at 500 Subscribers. This model from Jeremy Shafer marinates the two together! As usual Thank-You for supporting my Channel and Enjoy!!! Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel

block_list.title: More Designs from Jeremy Shafer
